posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: hexo搭建指南
posts.text: 项目搭建1234567cd ~/Projectshexo init personal_blog # 会在Projects目录下生成personal_blog项目cd personal_blognpm install -S hexo-theme-icarus hexo-renderer-inferno# 修改_config.yml中的theme为icarushexo config theme icarushexo server # 查看预览 项目部署123456789npm install hexo-deployer-git --save# 修改_config.yml# deploy:# type: git# repo: git@github.com:JohnYiZheng/JohnYiZheng.github.io.git# branch: hexohexo cleanhexo generatehexo deploy 新建帖子12345hexo new post "hexo搭建指南"# 在personal_blog/source/_posts下自动创建.md文件hexo cleanhexo generatehexo deploy
